content:
A /now page is a great way to share whatâ€™s going on in your life now.
I love to be creative in my personal time (code, art, photography), support open source, and love all things technical, so right now everything intersects well.
Doing # Rediscovering things that bring me joy, such a photography, music, light coding/making things pretty. I need more beauty in my life so I want to create it. (I swing from cozy to volent depending on my mood ğŸ¤£)
Working # At a digital media publisher where I work with editorial staff and work with a developer team to keep our websites afloat. Living # In Detroit with my boyfriend and 2 pups Last updated Nov 2023 #
summary: A /now page is a great way to share whatâ€™s going on in your life now.
title: What I'm up to now

content:
Hi I’m B, a New Yorker living in the Metro Detroit area ğŸ‘‹ğŸ½ My work background is in tech (I was a systems engineer, part time web dev, and now a manager). I would love to find more diverse folks in gaming, tech, music and all things creative. I love to travel, take photos, game on my PC, PS5 and Switch, stream, tweak code and always learning something new. âœ¨
Iâ€™m doing a digital overhaul for the next few months and would like to make this site a digital garden, or in my case, a digital cafe; a personal space to gather projects, what I’m working on, thoughts, and notes.
I blog events and photos on my blog, post random snippets on Mastodon and you can see all of my other work on my links page. Thanks for visiting!
summary: Hi I’m B, a New Yorker living in the Metro Detroit area ğŸ‘‹ğŸ½ My work background is in tech (I was a systems engineer, part time web dev, and now a manager).

Audio # I upload my music to SoundCloud if you want to listen to some mixes I’ve streamed!
BinaryDigit Â· Halloween House Stream Mix BinaryDigit Â· Trance/Dubstep/EDM Stream Mix BinaryDigit Â· Latin House DJ Stream Mix 3-31-2023 Video # I upload videos to YouTube and sync them to MakerTube (an open source video platform that’s part of the fediverse).

title: Music Mixes

content:
This Website Redesign # I’m redoing my website with Hugo and loving it so far. A while back my brain didn’t click well with static site generators, but now I’m loving it.
I’m using the Blowfish theme which is incredibly customizable and has so many features!
Livestream # I stream on Twitch with a fallback to YouTube. I’m working on getting a schedule back on track with a mix of playing games one day, then DJ sets the next.
summary: This Website Redesign # I’m redoing my website with Hugo and loving it so far.
title: Projects
